summary: This document contains an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a meeting. Epstein apologizes for typos and indicates he will be home shortly, inviting Staley to come over. The email is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers related to securities and legal matters.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a meeting with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, coordinating a meeting with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are coordinating a personal meeting.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on January 18-19, 2011.
Epstein invites Staley to come over to his home.
The email contains a disclaimer regarding confidentiality and legal matters.
